name: Ash Garden
description:
Ash Garden is puzzle game inspired by the California wildfires of 2020. A kid and a cat  must work as a team to escape the fire.

The demo for this game was created as part of a graduate class at WPI in the fall of 2020. You can view a blog of the games development on the website:
https://jdboucher2.wixsite.com/ashgarden
